name: Sparkle Turntable Bot
body:
### Turntable.fm Bot
Sparkle Turntable Bot is the most popular free room bot on [Turntable.fm](http://www.turntable.fm). This bot is written in Node.JS and uses an optional MySQL server for room statistics. This project is developed and maintained by @sharedferret.

### Features
This bot can:

* Manage a waitlist/queue for a room
* Enforce room rules regarding song limits and timeouts before a person can DJ again
* Respond to a set of commands in chat and through TT.FM's new PM system
* Report song stats after each song
* Welcome users to the room via chat and PM
* Receive and respond to commands via HTTP requests
* Log events to the console and/or a MySQL database

### See it in action

* xxMEOWxx in [Indie/Classic Alternative 1 and Done](http://turntable.fm/indieclassic_alternative_1_done)
* SearsTower in [Windy City Indie](http://turntable.fm/windy_city_indie2)

See a full list [on the Wiki](https://github.com/sharedferret/Sparkle-Turntable-Bot/wiki/Running-Bots).

### Get your own
[This guide](https://github.com/sharedferret/Sparkle-Turntable-Bot/wiki/Get-Started) will help you set up a copy of the bot in your Turntable.fm room. While it should be relatively straightforward, it does assume that you have a basic understanding of using a shell or command line. Since Sparkle Turntable Bot is designed to run 24 hours a day, installation on a server is optimal, but the bot will run fine on a personal computer.

### Contributors
Thanks to @alaingilbert for creating [TTAPI](https://github.com/alaingilbert/Turntable-API/), the starting point for Sparkle Turntable Bot. Thanks to @jtrutwin, @psujohn, and @overlordnyaldee for contributing, to everyone in [I/CA](http://turntable.fm/indieclassic_alternative_1_done) and [WCI](http://turntable.fm/windy_city_indie2) for putting up with my testing, and to everyone who's tried my bot in their room. You're all awesome!

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? If you've got a nontrivial question, feel free to contact me. I'm usually hanging out in the [Indie/Classic Alt 1+Done room](http://turntable.fm/indieclassic_alternative_1_done) on Turntable.

Found a bug? [Report it!](https://github.com/sharedferret/Sparkle-Turntable-Bot/issues)
